title: fat chicken curry
description: Marinating the meat is the key to this light, jalfrezi-style curry because it provides loads of flavour without adding any unnecessary fat. This meal provides 164 kcal, 21g protein, 13.7g carbohydrate (of which 11g sugars), 2.9g fat (of which 0.5g saturates), 4.1g fibre and 1.4g salt per portion.
ingredients: 3 skinless chicken breasts, trimmed and cut into bite-size pieces
1-2 long green chillies, to taste, finely chopped
2 green peppers, seeds removed and cut into chunks
4 tomatoes, seeds removed, quartered, cut into strips
½ small bunch coriander, roughly chopped
2 tomatoes, seeds removed, quartered and finely chopped
half a cucumber, roughly peeled, quartered lengthways, seeds removed and sliced
½ small bunch coriander, leaves and stalks finely chopped
